headline: Tracking Ray Dalio's Bridgewater Associates 13F Portfolio - Q1 2025 Update

headline: VST Still a Top Pick Despite Price Cut, Says Evercore, Citing Strong EBITDA Path
summary: Evercore ISI analyst Durgesh Chopra recently lowered the price target on Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) to $192 from $202 and kept an Outperform rating on the shares. Vistra operates as an integrated retail electricity and power generation company. In an investor note, the analyst noted that all of the major Independent Power Producers had reported their […]
